# ONDYS.DEV — Portfolio of Ondřej Sládek

> Solo developer & product builder based in Prague, Czechia.
> Specializing in Flutter mobile apps, offline-first solutions, AI visibility tools, and web security scanning.

## About

I'm Ondřej Sládek (ONDYS), a solo developer focused on building practical tools that solve real problems. I work primarily with Flutter for cross-platform mobile development, with a strong focus on offline-first architecture, PDF generation, and QR payment integrations.

## Primary Services

1. **Flutter Mobile App Development**
   - Cross-platform Android & iOS apps
   - Offline-first architecture (SQLite/Drift)
   - PDF generation, QR code payments
   - API integrations (ARES, payment gateways)

2. **AI-ready Website & E-commerce Audits**
   - Visibility analysis for AI search (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google SGE)
   - Schema markup and structured data audits
   - Recommendations export (CSV/PDF/XML)

3. **Web Firewall / Security Scanning**
   - Detection of manipulative patterns (dark patterns)
   - Prompt injection attempt detection
   - Data exfiltration risk analysis

## Selected Projects

- **FACHA** — Offline invoice & job tracking app for tradespeople (Flutter, SQLite, PDF/QR)
- **AI Audit Tool** — Website AI visibility checker with reporting
- **Web Firewall** — Security scanner for risky web patterns
- **Idle Economy Simulator** — Game economy balancing tool (Godot)
